docs.snippet: The Light Guard of New-York entertained our military visitors, the Light Guard of Milwaukee, in a true soldierly and brotherly manner, at their armory at Lafayette Hall, Broadway,yesterday evening.

headline.main: Entertainment to the Milwaukee Light Guard by the New-York Light Guard at their Armory.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Light Guard of New-York entertained our military visitors, the Light Guard of Milwaukee, in a true soldierly and brotherly manner, at their armory at Lafayette Hall, Broadway,yesterday evening.

headline.main: Important from Mr. Botts-The Opposition Denouncing the Administration Doctrine of Citizenship, and Insisting on the Prosection of Naturalized Americans Abroad.

docs.snippet: The steamer Falcon, refitted into a Floating Hospital, as we have already said, is almost ready for use. But when she is completed what will the Commissioners of Quarantine do with her ? This is the imperative Quarantine question of the hour.

headline.main: What Will They Do With It?

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamer Falcon, refitted into a Floating Hospital, as we have already said, is almost ready for use. But when she is completed what will the Commissioners of Quarantine do with her ? This is the imperative Quarantine question of the hour.

docs.snippet: The Boston Journal says: "Between sixty and seventy of the crew of the Minnesota, who were paid off yesterday, have left the city for their respective homes, with their money all safe. These hardy seas of the ocean, as fast as they received their...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Boston Journal says: "Between sixty and seventy of the crew of the Minnesota, who were paid off yesterday, have left the city for their respective homes, with their money all safe. These hardy seas of the ocean, as fast as they received their money, placed it in the hands of the acting agent of the Bos. ton Port Society, Constable John C. Harrington,

docs.snippet: COMMISSIONERS OF EMIGRATION.-The Board of Commissioners met yesterday afternoon. The weekly report states that 2,270 emigrants arrived during the last week, making a total for the year of 31,176, against 28,834 for the corresponding portion of last...
docs.lead_paragraph: COMMISSIONERS OF EMIGRATION.-The Board of Commissioners met yesterday afternoon. The weekly report states that 2,270 emigrants arrived during the last week, making a total for the year of 31,176, against 28,834 for the corresponding portion of last year. There are 748 inmates in the Ward's Island institution, and 66 in the Marine Hospital.

docs.snippet: BOARD OF HEALTH.--The Brooklyn Board of Health held an adjourned meeting, yesterday, in the office of the Health Officer, City Hall. The Mayor was authorized to make a temporary arrangement with FRANCIS SWIFT, the lowest bidder, for the contract to...
docs.lead_paragraph: BOARD OF HEALTH.--The Brooklyn Board of Health held an adjourned meeting, yesterday, in the office of the Health Officer, City Hall. The Mayor was authorized to make a temporary arrangement with FRANCIS SWIFT, the lowest bidder, for the contract to remove the offal of the city.

docs.snippet: A visitor to the State Prison at Sing Sing, if only a visitor, not urged to make a long tarry, is very areeably impressed. The premises are scrupulously clean, destitute of the minutest speck of dirt. The floors are scenred to a wonderful degree of...

headline.main: A VISIT TO THE STATE PRISON.; Affairs at Sing-Sing State Prison--The New Punishment.

docs.lead_paragraph: A visitor to the State Prison at Sing Sing, if only a visitor, not urged to make a long tarry, is very areeably impressed. The premises are scrupulously clean, destitute of the minutest speck of dirt. The floors are scenred to a wonderful degree of whiteness.

docs.snippet: To the Editor of the New-York Times: The main object of laborers in the cause of temperance has been to enlighten the public mind as to the effect of intoxicating liquors, as a beverage, on the health, happiness, virtue and prosperity of the people,...

headline.main: Intemperance and Pestilence--Letter from E. C. Delavan, Esq.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: The main object of laborers in the cause of temperance has been to enlighten the public mind as to the effect of intoxicating liquors, as a beverage, on the health, happiness, virtue and prosperity of the people, so that they could act understandingly should they think action necessary.

docs.snippet: The steamship City of Manchester, from Queenstown June 3, arrived at this port yesterday morning. Her dates are not so late as those by the Europa, but from Cork papers of the 3d we derive a few additional details.

headline.main: THE EUROPEAN NEWS.; Spread of the Revolution in the Valtelline. THE WAR FEELING IN GERMANY. A Decisive Battle Imminent. ARRIVAL OF THE CITY OF MANCHESTER. The Mails by the North Briton and the Europa. ADDITIONAL DISPATCHES AND DETAILS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship City of Manchester, from Queenstown June 3, arrived at this port yesterday morning. Her dates are not so late as those by the Europa, but from Cork papers of the 3d we derive a few additional details.
